misc: Might have trouble getting to the tee on time
biography: Jaakko, a gentleman of leisure and a connoisseur of fine wines, brings a certain 'je ne sais quoi' to the greens of the Hector Trophée. Representing Hirsala Golf, Jaakko's relaxed demeanor might occasionally test the patience of his playing partners, but his innate talent is undeniable.

With three past appearances, Jaakko is a familiar face at the Hector Trophée. While the Hector Trophée and Victor Trophy have eluded him thus far, Jaakko's competitive spirit remains undimmed, and he is expected to participate in the Hector Trophée 2025.
Spectators are advised to keep an eye on their watches; Jaakko's punctuality is as unpredictable as his putting. Nevertheless, his presence guarantees a memorable tournament.
